sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Countries.css'; const Countries = () => { const countries = [ { name: 'Bahrain', flag: 'üáßüá≠', capital: 'Manama', description: 'A modern island nation in the Persian Gulf, known for its financial services sector and technological innovation.', services: [ 'Financial Technology Solutions', 'E-Government Systems', 'Digital Banking Platforms', 'Smart City Infrastructure' ], color: '#CE1126' }, { name: 'United Arab Emirates', flag: 'üá¶üá™', capital: 'Abu Dhabi', description: 'A federation of seven emirates, leading the region in digital transformation and smart city initiatives.', services: [ 'Smart City Development', 'AI-Powered Solutions', 'Digital Transformation', 'Cloud Infrastructure' ], color: '#00732F' }, { name: 'Kuwait', flag: 'üá∞üáº', capital: 'Kuwait City', description: 'A prosperous nation with a strong focus on digital innovation and modern technology adoption.', services: [ 'Enterprise Software Solutions', 'Digital Banking Systems', 'Government Digital Services', 'Mobile Applications' ], color: '#009639' }, { name: 'Qatar', flag: 'üá∂üá¶', capital: 'Doha', description: 'A rapidly developing nation investing heavily in technology and digital infrastructure.', services: [ 'Sports Technology Solutions', 'Educational Technology', 'Healthcare Digital Systems', 'Tourism Technology Platforms' ], color: '#8D1B3D' } ]; return (

Expanding our technology expertise across the Gulf region

Our Regional Presence

PMI IT has established a strong presence across the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries, delivering cutting-edge technology solutions tailored to each nation's unique needs and digital transformation goals.

{country.flag}

{country.name}

Capital: {country.capital}

{country.description}

Our Services in {country.name}:

    {country.services.map((service, serviceIndex) => (
  • ‚úì {service}
    • ))}

))}

); }; export default Countries;
